entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 this morning. High 25. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
